content: Good read, Jonathan; I’m going to share this with my team. It’s always good – even as an experienced designer – to fall back to some fundamentals and resharpen your tools. Two strategies I always push designers towards for improving their craft are: Learning how to talk about your work and qualify the decisions you’ve made (in the right way; people will see through BS) is as important as being able to push pretty pixels around.Just show up. If you’re not there, you can’t work. If you can’t work, you can’t improve.
